basic.name: Sand Blast
basic.description: After 0.5 seconds, fire a missile that deals 305 damage to the first enemy hit. Deals 50% damage to Structures. Casting Sand Blast leaves an Echo behind that mimics Chromie's Sand Blast and Basic Attack, dealing 40% damage. Maximum of 1 Echo active at a time.

basic.name: Dragon's Breath
basic.description: Launch 3 blasts into the air that land every 0.75 seconds toward the targeted direction, dealing 215 damage each.

basic.name: Time Trap
basic.description: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. Chromie's Trait can be activated to detonate the trap, placing all nearby allied or enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 2 seconds. Maximum of 1 trap active at a time.

heroic.name: Slowing Sands
heroic.description: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by 10% every 0.25 seconds, up to 70%.

heroic.name: Temporal Loop
heroic.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them. Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop.

heroic.name: Friendship Loop
heroic.description: {highlight}Choose an Allied Hero. After 4 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal friendship was cast on them on the exact same state except for the heroic ability.{/highlight}

trait.name: Timewalker
trait.description: Chromie has traveled to the future, and as such, will learn her Talents 2 levels earlier than her teammates!

1.name: Once Again the First Time
1.description: Quest: Hit 40 Heroes with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes. Reward: Increase the maximum number of active Echoes to 2, and increase Echo damage to 45%.

1.name: Deep Breathing
1.description: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 1%, up to 20%. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Dragon's Breath by 4 seconds and its Mana cost from 65 to 40.

1.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
1.description: Cooldown: 25s Gain 10% Spell Power and reduce the arming time of Time Traps by 0.75 seconds. Activate to reveal the targeted area for 4 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds.

4.name: Chronic Conditions
4.description: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap are Slowed by 30% for 3 seconds and allies gain {highlight}stacking{/highlight} 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Time Troubles
4.description: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap lose 15 Armor for 3 seconds and allies gain 30 Armor for 3 seconds.

4.name: Andorhal Anomaly
4.description: Increase the charges and maximum active Time Traps to 3, and reduce its cooldown by 8 seconds.

7.name: Bronze Talons
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes grants 50% additional Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds.

7.name: Mobius Loop
7.description: Dragon's Breath deals 30% bonus damage to enemies hit by its center. Enemy Heroes hit by its center are Slowed by 60% for 0.75 seconds.

7.name: It's Skill O'Clock
7.description: {highlight}Every 12 seconds resets Chromie basic abilities cooldown.{/highlight}

10.name: Slowing Sands
10.description: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by 10% every 0.25 seconds, up to 70%.

10.name: Temporal Loop
10.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them. Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop. {highlight} Friendship Loop can also be cast on allied heros resetting their state after 4 seconds except for the heroic ability. Shares cooldown with Temporal Loop{/highlight}

13.name: Gnome Speed Ahead!
13.description: After casting Sand Blast{highlight} or exiting stasis effects{/highlight}, Chromie gains 20% Movement Speed and 200% increased Health Regeneration for 3 seconds.

13.name: Here and There
13.description: Activate Here and There to teleport to an area near an Echo{highlight} or There and There for a stasis trap{/highlight}, swapping it with Chromie's previous location. {highlight}And activate Here and Here to bring all echos on Chromie current position{/highlight}

13.name: Time Out
13.description: Cooldown: 60s Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 5 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

16.name: Shifting Sands
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Chromie's primary Sand Blast grants 5% Spell Power for 8 seconds, up to a maximum of 50%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by the primary Sand Blast.

16.name: Fast Forward
16.description: If Chromie's primary Sand Blast travels at least 50% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds and it refunds 10 Mana.
passives: {highlight}Increase projectile speed by 15% and max range by 15%.{/highlight}

16.name: Quantum Overdrive
16.description: {highlight}Creates a zone that will speed every allied non-heroic unit time by 100% and slow every enemy non-heroic unit time by 75% for 8 seconds.{/highlight}

20.name: Unravelling
20.description: {highlight}Cast an additional Speeding sands area on Chromie cast position, this area will instead speed up allied heroes by 10% every 0.25 second, up to 50%. The speed effect will persist for 0.75 seconds after leaving the area.{/highlight}

20.name: Stuck in a Loop
20.description: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first, and Basic Abilities continue recharging for an additional 3 seconds. Increase the cooldown recharge rate from 500% to 700%. {highlight} Using Friendship Loop will also reset heroics {/highlight}

20.name: Piercing Sands
20.description: Sand Blasts cast from Chromie and her Echoes now pierce all enemies hit.

20.name: T-I-M-E TRAP
20.description: {highlight}Chromie casts a giant time trap in target position that will detonate after 1.50 seconds making every hero in the area be on stasis for 0.75 seconds, this effect will be triggered 3 times sequentially.{/highlight}
